com.atc.simulator.display.view.vector_text

Class FloatGlyph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atc.simulator.display.view.vector_text.FloatGlyph

  • public class FloatGlyph
extends java.lang.Object
    A BitmapFont.Glyph who's position data is stored in floating point.
